/usr/bin/c++    -std=c++11 -g -O3 -g   -v -pedantic-errors CMakeFiles/rufius.dir/src/Rufius_Daemon.cxx.o CMakeFiles/rufius.dir/src/Rufius_Informer.cxx.o CMakeFiles/rufius.dir/src/Rufius_Main.cxx.o CMakeFiles/rufius.dir/src/Rufius_User.cxx.o CMakeFiles/rufius.dir/src/Rufius.cxx.o CMakeFiles/rufius.dir/src/Rufius_Motion.cxx.o CMakeFiles/rufius.dir/main.cxx.o  -o bin/rufius -rdynamic -lm -lresolv -ldl -lpthread -lcrypt -lnsl -ljpeg -lz -lavcodec -lavformat -lavutil -lswresample -lcurl -lcrypto -lssl lib/libmotion.a -lldns -lm -lresolv -ldl -lpthread -lcrypt -lnsl -ljpeg -lz -lavcodec -lavformat -lavutil -lswresample
